thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian will likely pay Scott Disick child support | The
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian will likely pay Scott Disick child support | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Kourtney Kardashian will likely pay Scott Disick child support | The
text:
The reality stars publicly dissolved their relationship earlier this month after photos surfaced of Disick canoodling with another woman in Monaco. According to an Us Weekly report, Kardashian has consulted high-power Hollywood divorce attorney Laura Wasser to seek sole custody of their three kids: Mason, 5, Penelope, 3, and Reign, 7 months.
Kardashian, 36, reportedly wants the children the majority of the time, but Disick, 32, is likely to get continual payouts from her since she is the higher earner, a family law attorney tells Page Six.
“Children have the right to live in the lifestyle of both parents regardless of where they are,” explained Goldie Schon, a California-based family law attorney.
“While Scott may only have the kids 10 per cent of the time, because [Kourtney] is such a high-income earner it’s very likely she would pay him child support. If Scott wants it and pushes it he will likely get child support from her,” said Schon. Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian attending the E! Upfront 2013 Event in New York.. Source: Supplied
The TV personalities were together for nine years but never married.
Disick — who checked into rehab earlier this year — was a no-show for daughter Penelope’s birthday outing to Disneyland on July 8 and has recently been on a downward spiral of cancelled club appearances amounting to thousands of dollars in lost income.
Although Kardashian is expected to fight for sole custody, it’s incredibly unlikely the kids will be kept from their father, Schon said.
Kourtney picked the kids up at the end of the playdate. Source: Splash News Australia
Scott took both the kids out for some fun on July 23, 2015. Source: Splash News Australia
“California likes to make sure children know both of their parents,” added Schon. “Scott may only have daytime visitation likely with a nanny to accompany them but [the state] is not just going to take these children from their father whether Kourtney likes it or not.”
Television drama has become currency for the couple but it’s likely their custody battle will be fought – and settled – behind closed doors.
“Kourtney has to fear her reputation and her status as a public figure. She likely has her own skeletons that Scott can use as a way of negotiating,” opined Schon.
Request for comment from Kardashian and attorney Laura Wasser was not immediately returned.
This story originally appeared in The New York Post.
Kourtney Kardashian and Scott Disick Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Countdown to the split
Originally published as Kourtney will likely pay Scott child support
